questions.question: What is the predominant color of the visible material?
What appears to be the primary material of the product?
What type of closure mechanism is visible on the product?
What color is the visible zipper pull or slider?
Describing the texture, is the surface smooth or rough?
What color is the inner lining visible through the opening?
What is the overall shape of the visible section of the product?
Judging by the image, does the material seem supple or rigid?
Considering the visible seams, are they straight or curved?
What is the apparent width of the grey accent strip?
Does the image show any visible stitching along the seams?
Based on the image, does the zipper seem to be heavy-duty or lightweight?
What is the visible style of the zipper application?
Is the image predominantly focused on the surface texture or the internal components?
Does the product appear to be a complete item, or a section of a larger one?
